name: Tri-Unity+ψ+μ Axiom
intent: Define the canonical weighted+modal extension of the δ–Φ–Π system.
axiom: For every pair of operators A,B ∈ {δ, Φ, Π}, the ψμ-weighted compositions commute:
constraints: μ acts multiplicatively on every δ,Φ,Π edge.
ψ acts functorially on any μ-weighted or unweighted morphism.
Normal Form NF\_TU\_psimu exists and is unique.
